name: Lenovo G50 15.6-Inch Laptop (Core i3, 6 GB, 500 GB)
description: The affordable Lenovo G50 notebook is less than 1 inch slim, but packed with features like an integrated DVD drive, the latest processor and HD graphics.

name: Apple iPhone 6, Silver, 64 GB
description: Built on 64-bit desktop-class architecture, the new A8 chip delivers more power, even while driving a larger display.

name: LG Electronics 42LB6300 42-Inch 1080p 120Hz Smart LED TV
description: The LB6300 begins with exceptionally clear Full HD 1080p resolution and crisp, bright LED backlighting, then adds LGs acclaimed Smart TV features.
